description:
Another tidbits collection is here! Astronauts, yokai, and Governor Jyushimatsu await.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koborebanashi Shuu 3 (Biyoushitsu / Tachi / Docking / Yomichi / Tonchi Master Chibikyuu / Matsuzou no Shigoto / Voice Kinou / Juushimatsu-chiji)
Tidbits Collection 3 (Salon / Stand Up / Docking / Path / The Master of Wit, Chibikyuu / Matsuzou`s Job / Voice Function / Governor Jyushimatsu)
こぼれ話集3 (美容室 / 立っち / ドッキング / 夜道 / とんちマスターちび休 / 松造の仕事 / ボイス機能 / 十四松知事)
